episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0245_00_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] intervened
to stop an argument between Marnie and some
other Trainers.

Speaking quietly and calmly but driving her points
relentlessly home, Marnie had been a bit scary...
I’m...sorry.

That lot was bad-mouthin’ you with a pack of lies,
an’ I got kinda carried away.
Thank you.
Ugh... Well ain’t you polite!
You shouldn’t fight.
Ugh... Sorry. I’ll...be more careful.

Ever since I was little, I just get real mad
whenever somebody says somethin’ bad about
stuff I care about...

Huh... I guess that means I care just as much
about you as I do about all my friends from Galar.
Speakin’ of them...I’m not like everybody else.

When I’m mad, I can’t seem to show it on my face
the way everybody else does.

I try to keep myself from gettin’ too fired up, and I
end up actin’ the way you saw just now.

Maybe this is part of the same thing that makes it
so hard for me to smile?

Guess I need to learn not to hold back those happy
feelin’s when I’m havin’ fun.

Yeah, I think I’m just a little closer to
understandin’ how to smile.

I’m not sayin’ I forgive ’em for what they said
about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...but I
guess I should be kinda grateful to that lot, too.

I know! I was already plannin’ to practice smilin’
later, so why don’tcha help
me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
You’d better be there!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Marnie started
smiling practice!
L-like this?
Then how ’bout this?
(Give her some tips.)

When I hear somethin’ confusin’ like that, it’s even
harder to smile...

(Say something funny to make
her laugh.)
Ahaha, thanks for tryin’ to make me laugh!

Hmm... It still feels real awkward. Smilin’ with
your whole face ain’t no easy feat!

And I’ve been askin’ people all over Pasio about
it, too.

Of course, I do all the practicin’ in private.
I’ve barely let anybody see—not even close
friends. Got it?
But I’m not gonna give up just ’cause it’s hard!

Someday, I swear I’ll get this down, and then I
can smile right back at all the people in Spikemuth
cheerin’ me on!

You must have people like that, too, right? People
you wanna smile back at?

Like your family or friends or fans, like that
Team Yell lot.

Of course, it’s also fine if you’re your own
number-one fan!

But you can get so much stronger when you’ve got
others in mind!
So I’m not plannin’ on losin’ to anybody.

Not to my big brother, my rivals, or even
Champion Leon...
And not to you, either!

OK! Just talkin’ about my feelin’s made me feel
a whole lot better!

I’m gonna keep on practicin’ so that someday I can
show you the biggest smile you ever saw!
You better be lookin’ forward to it!
